member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.CustomValidator.ValidateParameters(FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetRecordInfo)
member.summary: Validates the record information.
member.exception: Thrown when no record with such id found or when record information do not meet the requirements: firstname and lastname length should be in range [2;60], contain not only space symbols, dateofbirth should be in range [01.01.1950;DateTime.Now], grade should be in range [-10;10], height should be in range [0,3m;3m], favouritesymbol can't be a space symbol.
Thrown when firstname or lastname is null.
